Summary: Three solid red lights, low flying, no sound emitt
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ford City
There were no other sightings in Ford City on or around July 20th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I, along with her mother, brother, and sister-in-law were sitting onfront porch in rural setting, facing away from light sources. I was first tonotice three red lights in a line in the SW sky, two on the left closertogether, moving right to left. Lights remained equidistant from one anotherwhile it moved, seeming to be on one craft. OBJECT MADE NO SOUND, appeared tobe within 1.5 miles on horizon. Lights came from behind tree line, disappearedbehind tree line. NEVER WENT ABOVE TREE LEVEL. Planes and helicopters fly overmy house all the time (including after this) and their lights blinked, I couldhear their engines, and they were very, very high in sky, even when in the samedirection as this craft.
